articles.title: American parents targeted with misleading warnings on Covid-19 vaccination - Malay Mail
articles.description: WASHINGTON, Nov 11 — Registered nurse Melody Butler seeks to provide science-based answers to American parents as she urges them to vaccinate their children against Covid-19. But her efforts to do so on social media through Nurses Who Vaccinate — a volunteer …
articles.content:
Pins that will be given to children after they receive their first dose of Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine are seen at the Beaumont Health offices in Southfield, Michigan, November 5, 2021. AFP pic

articles.title: The Importance of Smoking Cessation - LMH Health
articles.description: The American Cancer Society states that smoking causes an estimated 480,000 deaths every year, or about 1 in 5 deaths. On top of this, more than 16 million Americans live with a smoking-related disease.
articles.content:
Dr. Krishna Rangarajan

articles.author: Hayden E. Klein
articles.title: Dr Robert Gabbay on COVID-19 Vaccinations in the Diabetes Community - AJMC.com Managed Markets Network
articles.description: Robert A. Gabbay, MD, PhD, chief scientific and medical officer at the American Diabetes Association, discusses COVID-19 vaccinations among people with diabetes as they have been disproportionally affected by the pandemic.
